title: Towards Transliteration between Sindhi Scripts from Devanagari to Perso-Arabic. (arXiv:2305.07365v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: In this paper, we have shown a script conversion (transliteration) technique that converts Sindhi text in the Devanagari script to the Perso-Arabic script. We showed this by incorporating a hybrid approach where some part of the text is converted using a rule base and in case an ambiguity arises then a probabilistic model is used to resolve the same. Using this approach, the system achieved an overall accuracy of 99.64%.

translated_title: 实现从天城文辛迪到波斯-阿拉伯文辛迪的音译
translated_abstract: 本文提出一种将天城文辛迪转换为波斯-阿拉伯文辛迪的转换技术。我们采用了一种混合方法，其中部分文本使用基于规则的方法进行转换，如果有歧义，则使用概率模型进行解决。使用这种方法，系统总体准确率达到99.64％。
tldr: 本文提出了一种将天城文辛迪转换为波斯-阿拉伯文辛迪的技术，通过混合使用基于规则和概率模型，系统取得了99.64％的准确率。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a transliteration technique that converts Sindhi text in the Devanagari script to the Perso-Arabic script, achieving an overall accuracy of 99.64% by using a hybrid approach of rule-based and probabilistic models.
